Leviton Decora In-Wall Smart Dimmer¶

Leviton DZ1KD-1BZ Decora Smart 1000W Dimmer with Z-Wave Plus Technology, White/Light Almond¶

Operation¶

  • At default the locator light will illuminate when the load is in the OFF position to facilitate access in the dark.
  • If using the dimmer in a 3-way application, the lights will turn ON at brightness set on dimmer’s DIM/BRIGHT bar. The lighting can be controlled from either the dimmer, the remote location or a Z-Wave® enabled controller.
  • By default setting, top rocker is ON and bottom is OFF
  • Tap the TOP half of the DIM/BRIGHT Bar – Lights will jump to the next brightness setting. Hold the TOP half of the DIM/BRIGHT Bar – Lights will brighten
  • Tap the BOTTOM half of the DIM/BRIGHT Bar – Lights will jump to the next dim setting. Hold the BOTTOM half of the DIM/BRIGHT Bar – Lights will dim.

Specification¶

  • Power: 120 VAC, 60 Hz.
  • Incandescent: 1000W
  • LED/CFL: 450W
  • Signal (Frequency): 908.42 MHz.

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network¶

  1. Put controller to Inclusion/Exclusion mode
  2. Press and hold top paddle until LED changes to orange, release then press top paddle once to reset device
  3. Wait for confirmation from Venus/Titan and then do above step once again
  4. Wait for controller completes inclusion/exclusion process

Configuration description¶

  1. Fade On time

    • Parameter: 1 (0x01)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      1. 0 = Instant On
      2. 1 - 127 = Seconds: 1 - 127 seconds
      3. 128 - 253 (0x80 - 0xFD) = Minutes: 1 - 126 minutes

    • Default: 2

  2. Fade Off time

    • Parameter: 2 (0x02)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      1. 0 = Instant Off
      2. 1 - 127 = Seconds: 1 - 127 seconds
      3. 128 - 253 (0x80 - 0xFD) = Minutes: 1 - 126 minutes

    • Default: 2

  3. Minimum light level
    • Parameter: 3 (0x03)
    • Size: 1 byte
    • Value: 0 ~ 100
    • Default: 10
  4. Maximum light level
    • Parameter: 4 (0x04)
    • Size: 1 byte
    • Value: 0 ~ 100
    • Default: 100
  5. Preset light level

    • Parameter: 5 (0x05)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0: Last memorized dim level 1 ~ 100: dim level

    • Default: 0

  6. LED Dim Level Indicator Timeout

    • Parameter: 6 (0x06)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0 = Level Indicators Off 1 - 254 (0x01 - 0xFE) = Level Indicator Timeout (seconds) 255 (0xFF) = Levels Always On

    • Default: 3

  7. Locator LED Status

    • Parameter: 7 (0x07)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0 = LED Off 254 (0xFE) = Status Mode 255 (0xFF) = Locator Mode

    • Default: 255

  8. Load type

    • Parameter: 12 (0x0C)

    • Size: 2 byte

    • Value:

      0 = Incandescent 1 = LED 2 = CFL 3 = Mark 10

    • Default: 0
